column3: P2P chat, video calls and file sharing

column4: parts of the protocol are described in prose or have example source code, but not enough to implement a client from via clean room https://github.com/holepunchto/pear-docs#building-blocks https://docs.pears.com/apps/keet
some libraries used by keet are published under Apache 2.0, but not enough to build a client from https://github.com/holepunchto

column3: no history, desktops must be online
column4: https://support.holepunch.to/hc/en-001/articles/13735214260881-How-to-create-a-room https://support.holepunch.to/hc/en-001/articles/13735302993681-How-to-invite-other-peers-to-join-a-room https://support.holepunch.to/hc/en-001/articles/13735350942865-How-to-join-a-room only available when desktops are online https://support.holepunch.to/hc/en-001/articles/14677582542865-How-to-guarantee-a-stable-connection-to-your-rooms https://support.holepunch.to/hc/en-001/articles/14678026808337-Ensuring-access-to-data-on-a-mobile-device-with-an-unstable-connection https://support.holepunch.to/hc/en-001/articles/14678797974673-Are-Keet-rooms-always-available-on-my-different-devices chat history not shared https://support.holepunch.to/hc/en-001/articles/13736141699217-Where-is-Keet-s-chat-history-stored-if-everything-is-Peer-to-peer-P2P https://support.holepunch.to/hc/en-001/articles/14678482505233-Will-my-phone-be-able-to-get-chat-history-if-participating-Desktops-are-diconnected
bold, italic, strike-through preformatted, ordered list, unordered list https://support.holepunch.to/hc/en-001/articles/13735188369553-A-beginner-s-guide-to-Keet

they recommend joining in multiple devices via separate accounts, not sure whether reusing the key would work at all https://support.holepunch.to/hc/en-001/articles/14678026808337-Ensuring-access-to-data-on-a-mobile-device-with-an-unstable-connection

column3: in any room the vendor doesn't admin

column4: https://support.holepunch.to/hc/en-001/articles/13736222126993-Why-do-I-get-an-error-if-I-don-t-give-Keet-access-to-the-local-network-devices user handles shared across rooms, connections can relay via other peers and each room uses a unique id key
Many basic features went missing for years and there seems to be little progress

column1: User can extend network with node

column4: Holepunch, bootstrap (existing peers may be substituted), software updates, Google and Apple for notifications on mobile

according to promotional material, but details are sparse https://docs.pears.com/apps/keet#how-it-works https://docs.pears.com/how-tos/connect-two-peers-by-key-with-hyperdht https://support.holepunch.to/hc/en-001/articles/13734669798033-What-is-Holepunch
messages can relay via other peers, blind forward is also implemented

column4: any peer can bootstrap, however Google Play and Apple censors and we would need to check the initial set of bootstraps in the app, ToS prohibits usage in countries under US embargo https://keet.io/terms https://keet.io/static/js/main.2e4cba5e.js
